title: Kesha transforms into an octopus with an oversized blue costume for Halloween bash in LA
text:
She recently debuted the music video for her latest single Raising Hell.

And Kesha proved to be in her element as she stepped out to host Jack Daniel's Tennessee Apple 'Raising Hell, Raising Spirits' launch event at The Houdini Estate in LA on Tuesday night.

The singer, 32, truly embraced the spirit of Halloween as she transformed into an exaggerated sea creature complete with towering silver flatform boots.

Sea-ing is believing! Kesha, 32, stepped out to host Jack Daniel's Tennessee Apple 'Raising Hell, Raising Spirits' launch event at The Houdini Estate in LA on Tuesday night

Kesha looked sensational in an over the top octopus ensemble with glittering boots and matching glittering nude-coloured tights.

She added to the look with a glamorous coat of make-up complete with sultry blue eyeshadow and curly brunette locks.

It is an exciting time for Kesha who is hot on the promotional trail for hew new single.

The two-time Grammy nominee recently told Billboard last month she was 'writing the f**k out of some pop songs.'

'I got my balls back, and they're bigger than ever,' the star said about her upcoming music.

Fashionable: Stephanie Montes opted for an all-black look as she posed away

Fun times: Drinks were flowing all night

Kesha also got reminiscent on her earlier styles of music and their lyrics such as in Tik Tok and Your Love Is My Drug.

'Men glorify going out, getting drunk and hooking up,' she told the magazine. 'As a woman, I came out and did it, and I was like Satan's little helper.'

The past few years have been challenging for Kesha with a visit to rehab for an eating disorder and ongoing legal battle against producer Dr. Luke.

'I'm not starving myself for s**t anymore. I'm too old for that,' Kesha told the publication following her 2014 stint in rehab.

'Been there, done that, it sucked, almost killed me, no thank you.'

In 2014, Kesha accused Dr. Luke - real name Lukasz Sebastian Gottwald - of raping her and subsequently sued him for sexual assault and battery. The suit was dismissed two years later.

The producer and his one-time protegee are now on course to go to trial next year, after a New York appellate court denied Kesha's latest appeal.

Dr Luke is suing the singer for defamation, claiming that Kesha made false claims about him so that he would release her from the recording contract she had signed with his label.
description: Kesha, 32, proved to be in her element as she stepped out to host Jack Daniel's Tennessee Apple 'Raising Hell, Raising Spirits' launch event at The Houdini Estate in LA on Tuesday night.
